item_abyssal_blade.description: Active: Stun a target enemy unit for %stun_duration% seconds. Goes through Spell Immunity. Passive: Bash - Gives a chance to stun for 1.4 seconds.
item_abyssal_blade.lore: The lost blade of the Commander of the Abyss, this edge cuts into an enemy's soul.
item_abyssal_blade.name: item_abyssal_blade

item_aegis.description: Passive: Reincarnation - Brings you to life with full health and mana %reincarnate_time% seconds after you die, at the location where you died. Reincarnation must be used within %disappear_time_minutes_tooltip% minutes or Aegis of the Immortal disappears. If it expires, it will heal you over 5 seconds (dispels on damage).
item_aegis.lore: The Immortal was said to own a shield that protected him from death itself.
item_aegis.name: item_aegis

item_ancient_janggo.description:
Active: Endurance - Gives bonus +%bonus_attack_speed_pct% attack speed and +%bonus_movement_speed_pct%%% movement speed to surrounding allies.
Passive: Swiftness Aura - Gives bonus attack and movement speed to surrounding allies.

Multiple instances of Swiftness Aura do not stack.
item_ancient_janggo.lore: A relic that enchants the bodies of those around it for swifter movement in times of crisis.
item_ancient_janggo.name: item_ancient_janggo

item_arcane_boots.description: Active: Replenish Mana - Restores mana in an area around the hero.\n\nFlat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
item_arcane_boots.lore: Magi equipped with these boots are valued in battle.
item_arcane_boots.name: item_arcane_boots

item_armlet.description: Active: Unholy Strength - Gives +31 damage, +10 attack speed, and +25 strength while active, but drains 40 HP per second.  You cannot die from the health loss when the bonus strength is gone, or the health drain per second.
item_armlet.lore: Weapon of choice among brutes, the bearer sacrifices his life energy to gain immense strength and power.
item_armlet.name: item_armlet

item_assault.description: Passive:  Assault Aura - Grants attack speed and armor to nearby allied units, and decreases armor for nearby enemies.\n\nMultiple instances of Assault Aura do not stack.
item_assault.lore: Forged in the depths of the nether reaches, this hellish mail provides an army with increased armor and attack speed.
item_assault.name: item_assault

item_basher.description: Passive: Bash - Gives a chance to stun for 1.4 seconds.
item_basher.lore: A feared weapon in the right hands, this maul's ability to shatter the defenses of its opponents should not be underestimated.
item_basher.name: item_basher

item_belt_of_strength.lore: A valued accessory for improving vitality.
item_belt_of_strength.name: item_belt_of_strength

item_bfury.description: Passive: Cleave - Deals a percent of attack damage in a %cleave_radius% area around the target. Ranged units cannot Cleave.
item_bfury.lore: The bearer of this mighty axe gains the ability to cut down swaths of enemies at once.
item_bfury.name: item_bfury

item_black_king_bar.description: Active: Avatar - Grants Spell Immunity and 100% Magic Damage Resistance.  Duration and cooldown decrease with each use.  Some Ultimate abilities are able to disable through Black King Bar.
item_black_king_bar.lore: A powerful staff imbued with the strength of giants.
item_black_king_bar.name: item_black_king_bar

item_blade_mail.description: Active: Damage Return - Returns any damage you take to the unit that dealt the damage.  Lasts 4.5 seconds.
item_blade_mail.lore: A razor-sharp coat of mail, it is the choice of selfless martyrs in combat.
item_blade_mail.name: item_blade_mail

item_blade_of_alacrity.lore: A long blade imbued with time magic.
item_blade_of_alacrity.name: item_blade_of_alacrity

item_blades_of_attack.lore: The damage of these small, concealable blades should not be underestimated.
item_blades_of_attack.name: item_blades_of_attack

item_blink.description: Active: Blink - Teleport to a target point up to %blink_range% units away.  If damage is taken, Blink Dagger cannot be used for 3 seconds.
item_blink.lore: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.
item_blink.name: item_blink

item_bloodstone.description: Active: Pocket Deny - Instantly causes you to die.\n\nPassive: Bloodpact - Begins with 8 charges, and gains a charge each time an enemy hero dies within 1675 range. Each charge grants 1 mana regeneration per second, reduces the gold lost from death by 25, and reduces respawn time by 4 seconds. If the bearer dies, 500 + 30 health per charge is restored to all allies within a 1675 radius, while the Bloodstone loses a third of its charges. A bloodmark is then placed where the bearer died, granting vision over a 1800 radius and allowing the bearer to gain nearby experience while dead.
item_bloodstone.lore: The Bloodstone's bright ruby color is unmistakable on the battlefield, as the owner seems to have infinite vitality and spirit.
item_bloodstone.name: item_bloodstone

item_boots.description: Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
item_boots.name: item_boots

item_boots_of_elves.lore: A tensile fabric often used for its light weight and ease of movement.
item_boots_of_elves.name: item_boots_of_elves

item_bottle.description: Use:  Regenerate - Restores HP and Mana over time. Effect is lost if unit is attacked. Empty Bottle refills near town fountain.  You can also store runes in the bottle, to save for later use.  After 2 minutes, stored Runes will be activated automatically.  If Bottle does not have full charges and is placed on a courier, the courier will move 30%% slower.\n\nHold Control to use your Bottle on an allied hero.
item_bottle.lore: An old bottle that survived the ages, the contents placed inside become enchanted.
item_bottle.name: item_bottle

item_bracer.lore: The bracer is a common choice to toughen up defenses and increase longevity.
item_bracer.name: item_bracer

item_branches.lore: A seemingly ordinary branch, its ironlike qualities are bestowed upon the bearer.
item_branches.name: item_branches

item_broadsword.lore: The classic weapon of choice for knights, this blade is sturdy and reliable for slaying enemies.
item_broadsword.name: item_broadsword

item_buckler.description: Active: Armor Bonus - Gives +%bonus_aoe_armor% to all nearby allied units.  Lasts 25 seconds on heroes, 30 seconds on units.
item_buckler.lore: A powerful shield that imbues the bearer with the strength of heroes past, it is capable of protecting entire armies in battle.
item_buckler.name: item_buckler

item_butterfly.description: Active: Flutter - Trade evasion for %bonus_move_speed%%% additional movement speed for %duration% seconds.\n\nStacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
item_butterfly.lore: Only the mightiest and most experienced of warriors can wield the Butterfly, but it provides incredible dexterity in combat.
item_butterfly.name: item_butterfly

item_chainmail.lore: A medium weave of metal chains.
item_chainmail.name: item_chainmail

item_cheese.description: Use: Instantly restores health and mana.
item_cheese.lore: Made from the milk of a long lost Furbolg vendor, it restores the vitality of those who taste it.
item_cheese.name: item_cheese

item_circlet.lore: An elegant circlet designed for human princesses.
item_circlet.name: item_circlet

item_clarity.description: Use: Restores mana on the target unit over time.  If the unit is attacked, the effect is lost.
item_clarity.lore: Clear water that enhances the ability to meditate.
item_clarity.name: item_clarity

item_claymore.lore: A sword that can cut through armor, it's a commonly chosen first weapon for budding swordsmen.
item_claymore.name: item_claymore

item_cloak.lore: A cloak made of a magical material that works to dispel any magic cast on it.
item_cloak.name: item_cloak

item_courier.description: Creature that carries items to and from your base.
item_courier.lore: Losing the donkey is punishable by death.
item_courier.name: item_courier

item_crimson_guard.description: Active: Guard - Grant nearby allied heroes a %block_chance_active%%% chance to block %block_damage_melee_active% damage from each incoming attack, along with %bonus_aoe_armor% armor. Lasts %duration% seconds.\nPassive: Damage Block - Gives the wearer a chance to block damage from each incoming attack based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.
item_crimson_guard.lore: A cuirass originally built to protect against the dreaded Year Beast.
item_crimson_guard.name: item_crimson_guard

item_cyclone.description: Active: Cyclone - A target unit is swept up in a cyclone and made invulnerable for %cyclone_duration% seconds. Cyclone can be cast on yourself. Enemy units take 50 magical damage upon landing.
item_cyclone.lore: A mysterious scepter passed down through the ages, its disruptive winds can be used for good or evil.
item_cyclone.name: item_cyclone

item_dagon.description: Active: Energy Burst - Burst of damage to target enemy unit. Upgradable.
item_dagon.lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.
item_dagon.name: item_dagon

item_dagon_2.description: Active: Energy Burst - Burst of damage to target enemy unit. Upgradable.
item_dagon_2.lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.
item_dagon_2.name: item_dagon_2

item_dagon_3.description: Active: Energy Burst - Burst of damage to target enemy unit. Upgradable.
item_dagon_3.lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.
item_dagon_3.name: item_dagon_3

item_dagon_4.description: Active: Energy Burst - Burst of damage to target enemy unit. Upgradable.
item_dagon_4.lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.
item_dagon_4.name: item_dagon_4

item_dagon_5.description: Active: Energy Burst - Burst of damage to target enemy unit. Upgradable.
item_dagon_5.lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.
item_dagon_5.name: item_dagon_5

item_demon_edge.lore: One of the oldest weapons forged by the Demon-Smith Abzidian, it killed its maker when he tested its edge.
item_demon_edge.name: item_demon_edge

item_desolator.description: Passive: Corruption - Your attacks reduce target's armor for 15 seconds.\n\nDesolator is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
item_desolator.lore: A wicked weapon, used in torturing political criminals.
item_desolator.name: item_desolator

item_diffusal_blade.description:
Active: Purge - Purges a target unit, removing its buffs, and slowing it. Instantly kills summoned units.
Passive: Manabreak - Your attacks burn %feedback_mana_burn% mana and deal the same amount in physical damage. Does not stack with other manabreak abilities.

Upgradable.
item_diffusal_blade.lore: An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.
item_diffusal_blade.name: item_diffusal_blade

item_diffusal_blade_2.description: Active: Purge - Purges a target unit, removing its buffs, and slowing it. Instantly kills summoned units.\nPassive: Manabreak - Your attacks burn %feedback_mana_burn% mana and deal the same amount in physical damage. Does not stack with other manabreak abilities.
item_diffusal_blade_2.lore: An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.
item_diffusal_blade_2.name: item_diffusal_blade_2

item_dust.description: Use: Reveal - Reveals and slows invisible Heroes in a nearby area.
item_dust.name: item_dust

item_eagle.lore: Capturing the majestic call of an eagle, this mystical horn brings limitless dexterity to those who hear it.
item_eagle.name: item_eagle

item_energy_booster.lore: This lapis gemstone is commonly added to the collection of wizards seeking to improve their presence in combat.
item_energy_booster.name: item_energy_booster

item_ethereal_blade.description: Active: Ether Blast - Launches a projectile which converts your target into ethereal form, increasing incoming magic damage. Target unit is slowed and cannot attack or be attacked, and takes %blast_agility_multiplier%x of your primary attribute + 75 as damage.
item_ethereal_blade.lore: A flickering blade of a ghastly nature, it is capable of dealing damage in both magical and physical planes.
item_ethereal_blade.name: item_ethereal_blade

item_flask.description: Use: Regenerate - Restores HP on the target unit over time.  If the unit is attacked, the effect is lost.
item_flask.lore: A magical salve that can quickly mend even the deepest of wounds.
item_flask.name: item_flask

item_flying_courier.description: Fast flying creature that carries items to and from your base.  Requires Animal Courier.
item_flying_courier.name: item_flying_courier

item_force_staff.description: Active: Force - Pushes any target unit %push_length% units in the direction it is facing.  Double click to self-cast.
item_force_staff.lore: Allows you to manipulate others, for good or evil.
item_force_staff.name: item_force_staff

item_gauntlets.lore: Studded leather gloves that add brute strength.
item_gauntlets.name: item_gauntlets

item_gem.description: Passive: True Sight - Gives the ability to see invisible units and wards. Drops on death, but cannot be destroyed.
item_gem.name: item_gem

item_ghost.description: Active: Ghost Form - Enter ghost form and become unable to attack or be attacked, but take 40%% extra magic damage. Using a Teleport Scroll dispels Ghost Form.
item_ghost.lore: Imbues the wielder with a ghostly presence, allowing them to evade physical damage.
item_ghost.name: item_ghost

item_gloves.lore: A pair of magical gloves that seems to render weapons weightless.
item_gloves.name: item_gloves

item_greater_crit.description: Passive: Critical Strike - Grants a chance to deal critical damage on an attack.
item_greater_crit.lore: A weapon of incredible power that is difficult for even the strongest of warriors to control.
item_greater_crit.name: item_greater_crit

item_greevil_whistle.description: Use the Greevil Whistle to temporarily transform into your Greevil!
item_greevil_whistle.name: item_greevil_whistle

item_greevil_whistle_toggle.description: Use the Greevil Whistle to toggle between Greevil and Hero!
item_greevil_whistle_toggle.name: item_greevil_whistle_toggle

item_halloween_candy_corn.description: Use: Deposit the candy in your bucket to give all heroes on the map gold and XP, or use it to satisfy a rampaging Roshan's sweet tooth. Get the highest candy in your bucket to win a prize! Carrying candy makes you less healthy, and decreases your max HP.
item_halloween_candy_corn.lore: A strange looking candy, made out of Greevil cream and gummy vitamins.
item_halloween_candy_corn.name: item_halloween_candy_corn

item_hand_of_midas.description: Active: Transmute - Kills a non-hero target for 190 gold and 2.5x experience.  Cannot be used on Ancient Creeps.
item_hand_of_midas.lore: Preserved through unknown magical means, the Hand of Midas is a weapon of greed, sacrificing animals to line the owner's pockets.
item_hand_of_midas.name: item_hand_of_midas

item_headdress.description: Passive: Regeneration Aura - Restores HP to allies in a %aura_radius% unit radius.\n\nMultiple instances of Regeneration Aura do not stack.
item_headdress.lore: Creates a soothing aura that restores allies in battle.
item_headdress.name: item_headdress

item_heart.description: Passive: Health Regeneration - Restores a percentage of max health per second. \n\nThis ability is disabled if damage is taken from an enemy Hero or Roshan within the last 4 seconds if your hero is melee or 6 seconds if your hero is ranged.
item_heart.lore: Preserved heart of an extinct monster, it bolsters the bearer's fortitude.
item_heart.name: item_heart

item_heavens_halberd.description:
Active: Disarms the target for %disarm_range% seconds. Lasts %disarm_melee% on Melee targets. 
Passive: Lesser Maim - Gives a chance on attack to slow movement speed for %maim_duration% seconds.

Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
item_heavens_halberd.lore: This halberd moves with the speed of a smaller weapon, allowing the bearer to win duels that a heavy edge would not.
item_heavens_halberd.name: item_heavens_halberd

item_helm_of_iron_will.lore: The helmet of a legendary warrior who fell in battle.
item_helm_of_iron_will.name: item_helm_of_iron_will

item_helm_of_the_dominator.description:
Active: Dominate - Take control of a non-hero, non-ancient target unit. Dominated units gain %health_bonus% bonus health.
Passive: Lifesteal - Gives lifesteal on attacks.

Helm of the Dominator is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
item_helm_of_the_dominator.lore: The powerful headpiece of a dead necromancer.
item_helm_of_the_dominator.name: item_helm_of_the_dominator

item_hood_of_defiance.lore: A furred, magic resistant headpiece that is feared by wizards.
item_hood_of_defiance.name: item_hood_of_defiance

item_hyperstone.lore: A mystical, carved stone that boosts the fervor of the holder.
item_hyperstone.name: item_hyperstone

item_invis_sword.description: Active: Shadow Walk - Makes you invisible until the duration ends, or until you attack or cast a spell.  While Shadow Walk is active, you move 20%% faster and can move through units.  If attacking to break the invisibility, you gain %windwalk_bonus_damage% bonus damage on that attack.  Lasts %windwalk_duration% seconds.
item_invis_sword.lore: The blade of a fallen king, it allows you to move unseen and strike from the shadows.
item_invis_sword.name: item_invis_sword

item_javelin.description: Passive: Pierce - Grants a chance to deal bonus damage.
item_javelin.lore: A rather typical spear that can sometimes pierce through an enemy's armor when used to attack.
item_javelin.name: item_javelin

item_lesser_crit.description: Passive: Critical Strike - Grants a chance to deal critical damage on an attack.
item_lesser_crit.lore: A blade forged from rare crystals, it seeks weak points in enemy armor.
item_lesser_crit.name: item_lesser_crit

item_lifesteal.description: Passive: Lifesteal - Gives lifesteal on attacks.\n\nMorbid Mask is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
item_lifesteal.lore: A mask that drains the energy of those caught in its gaze.
item_lifesteal.name: item_lifesteal

item_maelstrom.description: Passive: Chain Lightning - Grants a chance on attack to release a Chain Lightning that hits %chain_strikes% targets, dealing damage.\n\nMaelstrom is a Unique Attack Modifier that stacks with other Unique Attack Modifiers, but overrides them when Chain Lightning occurs.
item_maelstrom.lore: A hammer forged for the gods themselves, Maelstrom allows its user to harness the power of lightning.
item_maelstrom.name: item_maelstrom

item_magic_stick.description: Active: Energy Charge - Gains charges (max %max_charges%) based on enemies using abilities in a nearby area.  When activated, it restores health and mana based on the number of charges stored.
item_magic_stick.lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.
item_magic_stick.name: item_magic_stick

item_magic_wand.description: Active: Energy Charge - Gains charges (max %max_charges%) based on enemies using abilities in a nearby area.  When activated, it restores health and mana based on the number of charges stored.
item_magic_wand.lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.
item_magic_wand.name: item_magic_wand

item_manta.description:
Active: Mirror Image - Creates %images_count% images of your hero that last 20 seconds.

Melee images deal %tooltip_damage_outgoing_melee%%% damage and take %tooltip_damage_incoming_melee_total_pct%%% damage, while Ranged images deal %tooltip_damage_outgoing_ranged%%% and take %tooltip_damage_incoming_ranged_total_pct%%% damage.

Yasha-based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.
item_manta.lore: An axe made of reflective materials that causes confusion amongst enemy ranks.
item_manta.name: item_manta

item_mantle.lore: A beautiful sapphire mantle worn by generations of queens.
item_mantle.name: item_mantle

item_mask_of_madness.description:
Active: Berserk - Gives %berserk_bonus_attack_speed% attack speed and %berserk_bonus_movement_speed%%% movement speed but causes you to take extra %berserk_extra_damage%%% damage.  Lasts 12 seconds.
Passive: Lifesteal - Grants lifesteal on attacks.

Mask of Madness is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
item_mask_of_madness.lore: Once this mask is worn, its bearer becomes an uncontrollable aggressive force.
item_mask_of_madness.name: item_mask_of_madness

item_medallion_of_courage.description: Active: Valor - If cast on an ally, increases their armor while reducing the caster's. If cast on an enemy, reduces the armor of both the enemy and the caster.  Lasts 7 seconds.
item_medallion_of_courage.lore: The bearer has no fear of combat.
item_medallion_of_courage.name: item_medallion_of_courage

item_mekansm.description:
Active: Restore - Heals %heal_amount% HP and gives +%heal_bonus_armor% armor in an area.
Passive: Mekansm Aura - Bonus HP Regen in an area.

Multiple instances of Mekansm Aura do not stack.
item_mekansm.lore: A glowing jewel formed out of assorted parts that somehow fit together perfectly.
item_mekansm.name: item_mekansm

item_mithril_hammer.lore: A hammer forged of pure mithril.
item_mithril_hammer.name: item_mithril_hammer

item_mjollnir.description:
Active: Static Charge - Places a charged shield on a target unit which has a %static_chance%%% chance to release a shocking bolt at a nearby attacker and %static_strikes% additional enemies.
Passive: Chain Lightning - Grants a chance on attack to release a Chain Lightning that hits %chain_strikes% targets, dealing damage.

Mjollnir is a Unique Attack Modifier that stacks with other Unique Attack Modifiers, but overrides them when Chain Lightning occurs.
item_mjollnir.lore: Thor's magical hammer, made for him by the dwarves Brok and Eitri.
item_mjollnir.name: item_mjollnir

item_monkey_king_bar.description: Passive: Mini-Bash - Gives a chance to minibash and deal bonus damage.\nPassive: True Strike - Prevents your attacks from missing. True Strike does not work when attacking enemy structures.
item_monkey_king_bar.lore: A powerful staff used by a master warrior.
item_monkey_king_bar.name: item_monkey_king_bar

item_mystic_staff.lore: Enigmatic staff made of only the most expensive crystals.
item_mystic_staff.name: item_mystic_staff

item_necronomicon.description: Active: Demonic Summoning - Summons a Necronomicon Warrior and a Necronomicon Archer to fight for you.  Their strength and abilities increase as Necronomicon increases in level.  Lasts 40 seconds. Upgradable.
item_necronomicon.lore: Considered the holy grail of necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.
item_necronomicon.name: item_necronomicon

item_necronomicon_2.description: Active: Demonic Summoning - Summons a Necronomicon Warrior and a Necronomicon Archer to fight for you.  Their strength and abilities increase as Necronomicon increases in level.  Lasts 40 seconds.
item_necronomicon_2.lore: Considered the holy grail of necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.
item_necronomicon_2.name: item_necronomicon_2

item_necronomicon_3.description: Active: Demonic Summoning - Summons a Necronomicon Warrior and a Necronomicon Archer to fight for you.  Their strength and abilities increase as Necronomicon increases in level.  Lasts 40 seconds.
item_necronomicon_3.lore: Considered the holy grail of necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.
item_necronomicon_3.name: item_necronomicon_3

item_null_talisman.lore: A small gemstone attached to several chains.
item_null_talisman.name: item_null_talisman

item_oblivion_staff.lore: Deceptively hidden as an ordinary quarterstaff, it is actually very powerful, much like the Eldritch who originally possessed it.
item_oblivion_staff.name: item_oblivion_staff

item_ogre_axe.lore: You grow stronger just by holding it.
item_ogre_axe.name: item_ogre_axe

item_orb_of_venom.description: Passive: Poison Attack - Poisons the target, dealing damage over time and slowing, depending on whether your hero is melee or ranged.\n\nOrb of Venom is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.  Orb of Venom can be combined with Lifesteal Attack Modifiers.
item_orb_of_venom.lore: Envenoms your veapon with the venom of a venomous viper.
item_orb_of_venom.name: item_orb_of_venom

item_orchid.description: Active: Soul Burn - Silences target unit for %silence_duration% seconds and amplifies the damage it takes by %silence_damage_percent%%%.
item_orchid.lore: A garnet rod constructed from the essence of a fire demon.
item_orchid.name: item_orchid

item_pers.lore: A gem that grants heart to the bearer.
item_pers.name: item_pers

item_phase_boots.description: Active: Phase - Gives increased movement speed and lets you move through units.  Phase is cancelled upon using another item or ability.\n\nFlat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
item_phase_boots.lore: Boots that allow the wearer to travel between the ether.
item_phase_boots.name: item_phase_boots

item_pipe.description: Active: Barrier - Gives nearby friendly units a shield that blocks %barrier_block% spell damage.\nPassive: Insight Aura - Gives nearby friendly units %aura_health_regen% health regeneration.
item_pipe.lore: A powerful artifact of mysterious origin, it creates barriers against magical forces.
item_pipe.name: item_pipe

item_platemail.lore: Thick metal plates that protect the entire upper body. Avoid dropping on feet.
item_platemail.name: item_platemail

item_point_booster.lore: A perfectly formed amethyst that nourishes body and mind when held.
item_point_booster.name: item_point_booster

item_poor_mans_shield.description: Passive: Damage Block - Blocks physical attack damage based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee.  Poor Man's Shield will always block attacks from enemy Heroes, but has a chance to block damage from creeps.
item_poor_mans_shield.lore: A busted old shield that seems to block more than it should.
item_poor_mans_shield.name: item_poor_mans_shield

item_power_treads.description: Active: Switch Attribute - Changes selected attribute between Strength, Agility and Intelligence.\n\nPower Treads can be built using a Belt of Strength, Band of Elvenskin, or a Robe of the Magi.  Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack, nor does the attack speed bonus from multiple Power Treads.
item_power_treads.lore: A pair of tough-skinned boots that change to meet the demands of the wearer.
item_power_treads.name: item_power_treads

item_quarterstaff.lore: A basic staff that allows you to strike quickly.
item_quarterstaff.name: item_quarterstaff

item_quelling_blade.description: Active:  Destroy Tree/Ward - Destroy a target tree, or deals 100 damage to a ward.\nPassive: Quell - Gives bonus attack damage against non-hero units, based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee.
item_quelling_blade.lore: The axe of a fallen gnome, it allows you to effectively maneuver the forest.
item_quelling_blade.name: item_quelling_blade

item_radiance.description: Active:  Toggles Burn Damage on or off.\nPassive: Burn Damage - Deals damage per second in a %aura_radius% radius.
item_radiance.lore: A divine weapon that causes damage and a bright burning effect that lays waste to nearby enemies.
item_radiance.name: item_radiance

item_rapier.description: Drops on death.  Divine Rapier is muted to anyone but the owner, as long as he or his teammates pick it up. As soon as an enemy picks it up, Divine Rapier is unmuted, but cannot be dropped except on death.
item_rapier.lore: So powerful, it cannot have a single owner.
item_rapier.name: item_rapier

item_reaver.lore: A massive axe capable of tearing whole mountains down.
item_reaver.name: item_reaver

item_refresher.description: Active: Reset Cooldowns - Resets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities.
item_refresher.lore: A powerful artifact created for wizards.
item_refresher.name: item_refresher

item_relic.lore: An ancient weapon that often turns the tides of war.
item_relic.name: item_relic

item_ring_of_aquila.description:
Passive: Aquila Aura - Grants mana regeneration and armor in a %aura_radius% area of effect.
 Active: Toggle whether the aura affects other non-hero units.

Multiple instances of Aquila Aura do not stack.
item_ring_of_aquila.lore: The ring of the fallen Warlord Aquila continues to support armies in battle.
item_ring_of_aquila.name: item_ring_of_aquila

item_ring_of_basilius.description:
Passive: Basilius Aura - Grants mana regeneration and armor in a %aura_radius% area of effect.
 Active: Toggle whether the aura affects other non-hero units.

Multiple instances of Basilius Aura do not stack.
item_ring_of_basilius.lore: Ring given as a reward to the greatest mages.
item_ring_of_basilius.name: item_ring_of_basilius

item_ring_of_health.lore: A shiny ring found beneath a fat halfling's corpse.
item_ring_of_health.name: item_ring_of_health

item_ring_of_protection.lore: A glimmering ring that defends its bearer.
item_ring_of_protection.name: item_ring_of_protection

item_ring_of_regen.lore: This ring is considered a good luck charm among the Gnomes.
item_ring_of_regen.name: item_ring_of_regen

item_robe.lore: This robe corrupts the soul of the user, but provides wisdom in return.
item_robe.name: item_robe

item_rod_of_atos.description: Active: Cripple - Slows the target's movement speed.
item_rod_of_atos.lore: Atos, the Lord of Blight, has his essence stored in this deceptively simple wand.
item_rod_of_atos.name: item_rod_of_atos

item_sange.description: Passive: Lesser Maim - Gives a chance on attack to slow movement speed for %maim_duration% seconds.
item_sange.lore: Sange is an unusually accurate weapon, seeking weak points automatically.
item_sange.name: item_sange

item_sange_and_yasha.description: Passive: Greater Maim - Gives a chance on attack to slow movement speed for %maim_duration% seconds.\n\nYasha-based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.
item_sange_and_yasha.lore: Sange and Yasha, when attuned by the moonlight and used together, become a very powerful combination.
item_sange_and_yasha.name: item_sange_and_yasha

item_satanic.description:
Active: Unholy Rage - Increases Lifesteal by %unholy_lifesteal_percent%%% for %unholy_duration% seconds.
Passive: Lifesteal - Gives Lifesteal on attacks.

Satanic is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifier.
item_satanic.lore: Immense power at the cost of your soul.
item_satanic.name: item_satanic

item_shadow_amulet.description: Active: Fade - Grants invisibility to you or target allied hero over 1.5 seconds. Moving breaks the invisibility. There is no cooldown when using this item on yourself.
item_shadow_amulet.name: item_shadow_amulet

item_sheepstick.description: Active: Hex - Turns a target unit into a harmless critter for %sheep_duration% seconds. Destroys illusions.
item_sheepstick.lore: The most guarded relic among the cult of Vyse, it is the most coveted weapon among magi.
item_sheepstick.name: item_sheepstick

item_shivas_guard.description:
Active: Arctic Blast - Emits a freezing wave that does %blast_damage% damage to enemies and slows their movement by %blast_movement_speed%%% for %blast_debuff_duration% seconds.
Passive: Freezing Aura - Reduces attack speed on enemies.

Multiple instances of Freezing Aura do not stack.
item_shivas_guard.lore: Said to have belonged to a goddess, today it retains much of its former power.
item_shivas_guard.name: item_shivas_guard

item_skadi.description: Passive: Cold Attack - Attacks slow the movement and attack speed of the target.\n\nEye of Skadi is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.  Eye of Skadi can be combined with Lifesteal Attack Modifiers.
item_skadi.lore: Extremely rare artifact, guarded by the azure dragons.
item_skadi.name: item_skadi

item_slippers.lore: Light boots made from spider skin that tingles your senses.
item_slippers.name: item_slippers

item_smoke_of_deceit.description: Use: Upon activation, the user and all nearby allied player-controlled units gain invisiblity and bonus movement speed for a brief time.  Minimap icons will also be hidden.  Upon moving within 1025 range of an enemy hero or tower, the invisibility is lost.
item_smoke_of_deceit.name: item_smoke_of_deceit

item_sobi_mask.lore: A mask commonly used by mages and warlocks for various rituals.
item_sobi_mask.name: item_sobi_mask

item_soul_ring.description: Active: Sacrifice - Consume %health_sacrifice% HP to temporarily gain %mana_gain% Mana.  Lasts 10 seconds.
item_soul_ring.lore: A ring that feeds on the souls of those around it.
item_soul_ring.name: item_soul_ring

item_sphere.description: Spellblock - Passively blocks most targeted spells once every 17 seconds. Can be cast on an allied unit to temporarily transfer the buff.
item_sphere.lore: This magical sphere once protected one of the most famous heroes in history.
item_sphere.name: item_sphere

item_staff_of_wizardry.lore: A staff of magical powers passed down from the eldest mages.
item_staff_of_wizardry.name: item_staff_of_wizardry

item_stout_shield.description: Passive: Damage Block - Gives a chance to block damage based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.
item_stout_shield.lore: One man's wine barrel bottom is another man's shield.
item_stout_shield.name: item_stout_shield

item_talisman_of_evasion.description: Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
item_talisman_of_evasion.lore: A necklace that allows you to anticipate enemy attacks.
item_talisman_of_evasion.name: item_talisman_of_evasion

item_tango.description: Use: Eat Tree - Consume a tree to restore health over time. Comes with 4 charges.\n\nUse on an allied hero to give them one Tango.
item_tango.lore: Forage to survive on the battlefield.
item_tango.name: item_tango

item_tango_single.description: Use: Eat Tree - Consume a tree to restore health over time.
item_tango_single.name: item_tango_single

item_tpscroll.description: Use: Teleport - Teleports you to a target friendly building.
item_tpscroll.name: item_tpscroll

item_tranquil_boots.description: Passive: Break - Whenever you attack or are attacked, the health regeneration and 30 Movement Speed are lost for 13 seconds.
item_tranquil_boots.lore: While they increase the longevity of the wearer, this boot is not particularly reliable.
item_tranquil_boots.name: item_tranquil_boots

item_travel_boots.description: Active: Teleport - Teleports you to an allied non-hero unit or structure.\n\nFlat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
item_travel_boots.name: item_travel_boots

item_ultimate_orb.lore: A mystical orb containing the essence of life.
item_ultimate_orb.name: item_ultimate_orb

item_ultimate_scepter.description: Passive: Ultimate Upgrade - Upgrades the ultimate, and some abilities, of certain heroes.
item_ultimate_scepter.lore: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.
item_ultimate_scepter.name: item_ultimate_scepter

item_urn_of_shadows.description: Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within %soul_radius% units.  Only the closest Urn to the dying hero will gain a charge.\nActive: Soul Release - Heals HP over time to friendly units, but deals pure damage over time to enemy units.  The healing effect is lost if the affected unit takes damage from an enemy hero or tower.
item_urn_of_shadows.lore: Contains the ashes of powerful demons.
item_urn_of_shadows.name: item_urn_of_shadows

item_vanguard.description: Passive: Damage Block - Gives the wielder a chance to block damage from each incoming attack based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.
item_vanguard.lore: A powerful shield that defends its wielder from even the most vicious of attacks.
item_vanguard.name: item_vanguard

item_veil_of_discord.description: Active: Magic Weakness - Emits a weakening blast that increases the magic damage enemies take. Lasts %resist_debuff_duration% seconds.
item_veil_of_discord.name: item_veil_of_discord

item_vitality_booster.lore: A ruby gemstone that has been passed down through generations of warrior kin.
item_vitality_booster.name: item_vitality_booster

item_vladmir.description: Passive: Vladmir's Aura - Grants a variety of bonuses to nearby allies.  Lifesteal bonuses from Vladmir's Aura only affect melee units.  \n\nMultiple instances of Vladmir's Aura do not stack.
item_vladmir.lore: An eerie mask that is haunted with the malice of a fallen vampire.
item_vladmir.name: item_vladmir

item_void_stone.lore: Jewelry that was once used to channel nether realm magic, this ring pulses with energy.
item_void_stone.name: item_void_stone

item_ward_observer.description: Use: Places an Observer Ward to give sight of the surrounding area. Lasts 7 minutes.\n\nHold Control to give one Observer Ward to an allied hero.
item_ward_observer.name: item_ward_observer

item_ward_sentry.description: Use: Places a Sentry Ward to give True Sight of the surrounding area. Lasts 4 minutes.\n\nHold Control to give one Sentry Ward to an allied hero.
item_ward_sentry.name: item_ward_sentry

item_winter_cake.description: Use the cake to heal 400 health and 50 mana over 8 seconds
item_winter_cake.name: item_winter_cake

item_winter_coco.description: Use the cocoa to heal 300 health and 150 mana over 14 seconds
item_winter_coco.name: item_winter_coco

item_winter_cookie.description: Use the cookie to heal 350 health and 100 mana over 11 seconds
item_winter_cookie.name: item_winter_cookie

item_winter_greevil_chewy.description: After channeling for 2 seconds the greevil pops to the new location.
item_winter_greevil_chewy.name: item_winter_greevil_chewy

item_winter_greevil_garbage.description: Use the chow to heal your greevil 400 health and 150 mana over 5 seconds.
item_winter_greevil_garbage.name: item_winter_greevil_garbage

item_winter_greevil_treat.description: Makes your greevil move at max speed for 10 seconds.
item_winter_greevil_treat.lore: There is nothing faster than a greevil eating his favorite treat!
item_winter_greevil_treat.name: item_winter_greevil_treat

item_winter_ham.description: Use the ham to heal 300 health and 75 mana over 2 seconds
item_winter_ham.name: item_winter_ham

item_winter_kringle.description: Use the kringle to heal 250 health and 200 mana over 17 seconds
item_winter_kringle.name: item_winter_kringle

item_winter_skates.description: Gives a massive increase of 100 to movespeed. Increases control on the ice. Use short paths for the best result!
item_winter_skates.name: item_winter_skates

item_winter_stocking.description: Use: Open Stocking to receive your gifts!
item_winter_stocking.name: item_winter_stocking

item_wraith_band.lore: A circlet with faint whispers echoing about it.
item_wraith_band.name: item_wraith_band

item_yasha.description: Yasha-based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.
item_yasha.lore: Yasha is regarded as the swiftest weapon ever created.
item_yasha.name: item_yasha
